body_html:
@tatianashp I found this comment in issue 1984 that was incredibly helpful in understanding what is going on. But even that comment is not complete as I note here. It would be nice for somebody to have a look at these comments and incorporate them into the documentation.

Finally, one more thing that is not explained in the docs is why this phenomenon occurs (reported in issue 16333). Specifically, it seems as though the while loop is doing some type of copy semantics instead of referencing the inputs. In my mind, that is not at all the behavior I expect.
body_text:
@tatianashp I found this comment in issue 1984 that was incredibly helpful in understanding what is going on.  But even that comment is not complete as I note here. It would be nice for somebody to have a look at these comments and incorporate them into the documentation.
Finally, one more thing that is not explained in the docs is why this phenomenon occurs (reported in issue 16333). Specifically, it seems as though the while loop is doing some type of copy semantics instead of referencing the inputs. In my mind, that is not at all the behavior I expect.
body:
@tatianashp I found [this comment in issue 1984](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1984#issuecomment-211199897) that was incredibly helpful in understanding what is going on.  But even that comment is not complete [as I note here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1984#issuecomment-359713984). It would be nice for somebody to have a look at these comments and incorporate them into the documentation. 

Finally, one more thing that is not explained in the docs is why [this phenomenon occurs (reported in issue 16333)](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/16333). Specifically, it seems as though the while loop is doing some type of copy semantics instead of referencing the inputs. In my mind, that is not at all the behavior I expect.
